name: Wizard Tower [GameDev.TV Game Jam 2022]
description:
Made in 10 days for the GameDev.TV Game Jam of 2022

Team Members:

  • Lorelei: Team Lead (Game design, Character Art)
  • Hicuppp: Programmer (C# Unity)
  • Kera: Artist (Environments)

Theme: Death is Only the Beginning

A Wizard has brought together heroes of legend to his tower for a night of celebration! Shortly into the night, you discover there's a murderer afoot - due to having been killed yourself! The Grim Reaper will whisk you away to the afterlife, but gives you a chance to save the remaining guests at the party. 

You are now a Spirit with the power to possess and control. The Tower is in lockdown after the first murder, meaning only certain classes can enter certain rooms. Possess the guests to enter the rooms and find clues about who the murderer is.

Each room may contain a clue on what the murderer did not use to kill you. Find enough clues, and you've deduced who the killer must be! Return to the Grim Reaper with your findings to win the game.

Note: The game is playable but far from polished. It's very easy for a puzzle game, but we have ideas to make it better in the future. =]
